Very quiet shady site. Lots of mosquitoes and flies. There is no source.

04/02/2023 It is quite neglected, but for a quiet night it is worth it. You can hear the bell tower the quarters, half, three quarters and the hours, for us it was not a problem, in the end we slept well.

Nearby, if you look out over the Agramunt road, you will see a huge tree among the pear trees, on the left side, it is the banana tree declared by the Generalitat as monumental of Tornabousde, 4 m in diameter from its trail. It is also mandatory to go to the social bar of the old cinema that still works, being one of the 43 that are open in Spain with a theater. In homage to his 75th birthday at C 53 you will see the mural and next to it, recommended fruit from km0.

title_short: (43412) Solivella - 118 Carretera de Montblanc a Artesa
description: Great stop over on way north in large carpark for village. The village is lovely and historic ruins, bakery, post office etc. Check picture of map of village from village sign. There is a village water tap and recycling bins on opposite side of the road by a small pay park or another water point marked down road on park4night.

title: (43412) Solivella - 80 Carretera de Montblanc-Artesa
description: Just a water point. Parking of last resort !!

title: (25265) Castellnou de Seana - 9 Plaça Major
description: Small park in a village just off the highway. No table but low walls in the shade under the trees. ideal because no shade on the highway areas.

title: (43412) Solivella - 26 Carrer Garcia Salado
description: Parking inside the town but away from the urban area. It is wide and flat, with some shade and very quiet. It is marked as a parking lot for a nearby restaurant but it is used openly. The town is very quiet and offers a sense of security. There is a bakery, grocery store and a bar/restaurant. It is very nice but you can hear the bell tower 24 hours a day, every 15 minutes. We have spent two nights and no problem.

title: (08719) Rubió - 4 BV-1037
description: Parking with picnic tables surrounded by small mountains, in a flat parking, then in unequal parking. Maybe something gloomy is next to the cemetery, but should the calm be? Small fountain near the cemetery. Castillo de Rubió to visit with restaurant in skirt. Visited a day of work, maybe busy on the weekends. Hiking and cycling routes

title: (43421) Santa Perpètua de Gaià - 11 Cami de la Font
title_short: (43421) Santa Perpètua de Gaià - 11 Cami de la Font
description: 2 tables with benches, in front of the social premises of the town. Very quiet place in the middle of nature.

title: (08281) Sant Pere Sallavinera - Unnamed Road
description: Old aviation field of Sant Pere. Alta Segarra area surrounded by Nature

title: (25333) Castillo del Remei - Finca Castell del Remei
title_short: (25333) Castillo del Remei - Finca Castell del Remei
description: Nice place, very quiet, only at night peacocks sing and disturb, with an artificial lake and full of ducks and geese, possibility to buy wine in the cellar adjoining the restaurant, allowed to sleep there by the owners of the place

title: (43424) Sarral - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet car park overlooking Sarral. About 10 picnic tables under the trees. Barbeque available. Trash containers. (Closed during my visit, water tap and a restaurant 100m away.) Games for children. Access to CC, van and Caravan.

title: (25260) Ivars d'Urgell - Unnamed Road
description: An altre parking at the voltant de l'Estany d'Ivars d'Urgell, completely level with huge dimensions. Starting point of molts surrounding camins, guaites to observe the birdlife, picnic arees.Molta tranquility.

title: (25264) Vilanova de Bellpuig - 37 Cami L'Eral
description: Sports area parking. Paddle tennis court next door with skate park. In front of the car wash and next to it a picnic area with tables.

title: (08281) Sant Pere Sallavinera - 4 BV 1033
description: Very large parking lot in front of the town hall. During the day the noise of the traffic of the C-25 is heard, at night it is more subtle. There is a restaurant next door, but it must be on weekends and there is a basketball basket in front of the social premises. No shade, but with nice wind. Containers only available to neighbors and no bins in the vicinity. All the wooded area without papers or samples of our passage through the place, keep it up. He passed the city hall van and didn't tell us anything. The GR7 passes through the town and the surroundings are flat, perfect for easy cycling. The climb to Castell de Boixadors, Durilla, about 500m of unevenness.

title: (08719) Rubió - 9 BV-1031
description: Isolated and quiet place to spend the night, with good views of Igualada at the top of the hill, accessible slope

title: (25739) El Gos - Unnamed Road
description: Flat place for 2-3 campers without any service overlooking two ruins. Just stopped for a dog walk. The nearby C 14 can be heard. It's probably pretty quiet at night though.

title: (08719) Jorba - N-IIa
description: Parking at the start of a cycle lane. Possible to do with children

title: (43422) Ollers - 2 Passeig Moreres
description: Quiet viewpoint with parking spaces with good views. Somewhat narrow access. Large caravans not recommended.

name: Àrea d’autocaravanes de Vallverd
title: (25261) Àrea d’autocaravanes de Vallverd
description: There are two large trees and a picnic table. Quiet and perfect to spend a night. Free water service.

title: (25335) Penelles - s/n Plaça del Roser
description: Parking for visiting the city and for sleeping, very quiet, fountain, picnic area with grill. Right next to it is a bar with little things to eat. Additional info: In the village there is a free overnight parking lot without VE, if everything is full here.

title: (08281) Sant Pere Sallavinera -
description: Repsol gas station with truck parking and some smaller spaces for vans. attached to the road so there is noise from cars and trucks going by all the time.

title: (25317) Montclar - 38 Carrer de Montclar
description: Park at the entrance to the village next to the scale. Beautiful town with beautiful panoramic views and castle with guided tours on Sunday mornings and they make scapes rooms for people over 10 years old, very good plan! There is also the path through the Sierra de Montclar with the Canal de L Urgell mine as a curiosity.

title: (43411) Blancafort - 17 Avinguda Onze de Setembre
description: Picnic area, with tables, barbecues and a fountain. There are swings for children. There is a bar and a public pool in summer. Very quiet place.

title: (25241) Golmés - 47D Carrer Carretera Vella
description: Beautiful pump track for bikes, skateboards, scooters to take a break with the children. drinking water on site

title: (25335) Penelles - 34 Carrer de Baix
description: Penelles parking

title: (08719) Rubió -
description:
Several places on the service roads of the Rubió wind farm where you can park and take a good walk with some brutal views. There are no trash cans or garbage containers, take your garbage and don't leave it here (as the couples who come to "get intimate" here do) so that we can all continue to enjoy it.
Impressive to see the mills so close.

title: (25245) Vila-sana - Unnamed Road
description: Lake Ivars and Vila-sana. you can park in the car park and go for a bike ride or walk around the lake. You can sleep without problems. There are toilets, but ...

title: (25281) Peracamps - Unnamed Road
description: Hidden place from the road with a couple of stone tables between trees. Somewhat shaded and hidden from view. Perfect for a stop on the road

title: (43411) Blancafort - TV-2337
description: Quiet place next to the road. I have spent a very quiet night.

title: (25740) Ponts - 3 Plaça del Segre Mitjà
description: Drinking water

title: (25740) Ponts - 9-3 Avinguda Font de Valldans
description:
Aparcamiento de 6 plazas perfectas para autocaravanas justo pegado a la piscina del pueblo muy bonita con agua salada y unas pistas deportivas abandonadas.
Puedes pernoctar sin problema mucha sombra y tranquilidad. Del centro de ocio a 6 minutos andando.

title: (43423) Pira - 10 Carrer Cèsar Martinell
description: Parking for trucks but no problem to park, has little use of trucks. 2 minutes from the town center and possible routes. No services

title: (25241) Golmés - A-2
description: Gas station, but with parking for trucks, if it is to sleep and continue on the road and refuel diesel it is very good, it is quiet and it has a good bar-restaurant although at night it is closed

title: (25740) Ponts - 1 Plaça Anton Castellà
description: New laundry near Ponts area

title: (25245) Vila-sana - 4 Carrer Plaça Major
description: Parking on the street, in front of the town hall. Without services. With playground and bakery.

title: (25140) Arbeca -
description: Large sandy parking lot at the entrance to the "Poblado Ibero de la Arbeca" there is no sign prohibiting staying overnight. We spent the night in Vinya el Vilar and only visited here but it's fine, it's flat and quiet. City tours on Saturdays and Sundays from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m.

title: (25740) Ponts - 95 Carretera de La Seu d'Urgell
title_short: (25740) Ponts - 95 Carretera de La Seu d'Urgell
description: Motorhome area. Safe, fenced and shaded area. Wifi service and filling and emptying of water. Electricity service optional.

title: (43816) Querol - C-37
description: Narrow access to a small esplanade that gives a natural space to bathe (natural pond). Regular site for locals who come in summer. The dirt road is practicable for vehicles.

title: (25287) Ardèvol -
description: Para visitar el “Pessebre vivent” d’Ardèvol !

title: (08710) Santa Margarida de Montbui - BV-2204
description: Tossa de Montbui. magnificent views of the region in a beautiful setting. There is parking and far from any development.

title: (25747) Ponts - Unnamed Road
description: At the end of a small street, very quiet in front of the river. Only small vans, not camping car !!

name: Auró Natura
title: (25751) Auró Natura
description:
Hostel in the middle of nature
 with parking area inside the facility or in the forest.
Spacious bathrooms with showers.
Pool in summer.
Shelter for protected animals that can be visited for free.

title: (25740) Ponts - 20 Carrer Molí
description: Open air parking close to the river. Very quiet place. Near a park with a lake and barbecues. There are a lot of parking spots and they are big, it’s never full. Free. To get there you have to go through de Cadí restaurant street and at the end turn left by the road, not the gravel trail.

title: (25740) Ponts - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area next to the river, quieter than on the parking lot at 300 meters. Very nice view, possible walk along the river. Good tv reception.

title: (25747) Ponts - Unnamed Road
description: Stopping at the river you can leave the car in front and go down to the shore and bathe.

title: (43422) Barberà de la Conca - 40 Carrer del Comerç
title_short: (43422) Barberà de la Conca - 40 Carrer del Comerç
description: Free area at the bottom of the wine cooperative. water. changes.

title: (25616) Montgai - 30 Avinguda de la Generalitat
description: Quiet and free ground parking

title: (25287) Pinós - Unnamed Road
description: The center of Catalunya, Rosa dels vents, you can see impressive 360 views, sleep peacefully and a hostel on the coast that is super menja !!!

title: (25616) Montgai - 12 Carrer del Calvari
description: Himalaya is a cozy area for campers located in the province of Lérida, it has beautiful facilities which consist of a terrace with views, a place accommodated for its visitors and parking for your vehicle which is allowed a maximum length of 6 meters, it also has services such as water, electricity and gas at no additional cost. And the most fun thing is that in the facilities there is a 4-walled recodrome with a gym, activities and showers! The price of accommodation is €5 per night. It should be noted that bike carrier services are offered. We hope to see you soon here camper. Regards, we add that in the summer facilities of the rocòdrom they are cool since the walls are made of 35, 40 cm stone, we will try to ensure that they are well cared for, thank you campers. On the weekend of August 18, 19, 20 in the Himalayas, the following activities will be carried out, indicated on the poster in the image gallery of our welcoming profile. To go to the facilities that weekend, it is necessary to register in advance by calling or contacting through Instagram

title: (25410) L'Espluga Calba - 1F Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Large parking area ideal for visiting the town and surroundings of Les Garrigues.

title: (43816) Querol - 1 Passeig de la Font
description: Parking in the town of Querol. Flat area, very good access. Restaurant bar 200m walk from the same road.

title: (43410) Montblanc - C-14
description: Aire on restaurant. Room closed at night. Free if you eat in the restaurant. Very nice welcome, farm products for sale and served at the table.

title: (08700) Igualada - 47 Avinguda de Gaudí
description: Free parking on the shade of trees.

title: (08700) Igualada - Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Free municipal parking next to the gas station and 5 minutes from downtown. You can not park from 23 to 6 hours

title: (08700) Igualada - Cami de la Font de Can Masarnau
title_short: (08700) Igualada - Cami de la Font de Can Masarnau
description: Gravel parking space right next to the highway (25m). Perfect if you are passing through and just want to sleep. Pedestrians, joggers and cyclists and sometimes a car drives through.

address.street: Cami de la Font de Can Masarnau

title: (08700) Igualada - 15 Carrer Prat de la Riba
title_short: (08700) Igualada - 15 Carrer Prat de la Riba
description: Self-service laundry. Clothes dryers. Car wash. Diesel and gasoline at the best price in the area. Spacious place.

title: (08700) Igualada - 63 Avinguda de Balmes
description:
15 minutes drying 
 Extra machine for animal blankets etc

title: (25747) Gualter - Calle Carretera
description: A place surrounded by nature at the edge of the path. view of the flowing river. small dirt / gravel path to access it. ONLY SMALL VANS, NOT MOTORHOME. OK FOR MY TRFFIC L2H1

title: (08710) Santa Margarida de Montbui - 46 Carrer Doctor Fleming
title_short: (08710) Santa Margarida de Montbui - 46 Carrer Doctor Fleming
description: It is a very quiet parking lot at night. The squares are wide. Many cars pass by in the morning, but it is a little used place at night. You have to come at night to park because many office workers park here because there is no pay and you are 700m from the center.

title: (43811) Cabra del Campo - TP-2311
description: Picnic area with 2 tables and benches, in the sports center of the town. Very large esplanade for parking on site. Very quiet area

title: (08787) Orpí - BV-2131
description: Calm place in the woods and not far from the road. Not for a big caravans. Near the place there is a place called Santa Candida where you can have a bath on the river.

title: (08710) Santa Margarida de Montbui - 57 Carrer Progrés
title_short: (08710) Santa Margarida de Montbui - 57 Carrer Progrés
description: Parking at the end of a street, ample for 2 or maybe 3 vehicles. Street light, very quiet, if you respect the neighbors there is no problem to spend a night. close to several trails along very attractive routes. Town with all services very close.

title: (08710) Santa Margarida de Montbui - 72 Carrer Anselm Clavé
title_short: (08710) Santa Margarida de Montbui - 72 Carrer Anselm Clavé
description: Parking on the side of the road, in front of a tennis club and the pools of the village,

title: (43811) Fontscaldetes -
description: It is a very flat and level esplanade at the gates of the small abandoned town of Fontscaldetes which you have to visit because it is beautiful. We have come to sleep more than once since we also have a YouTube channel called RUTA Y MISTERIO dedicated to paranormal investigation. Perfect to disconnect and have complete peace of mind without any noise. Some nice views. PLEASE RESPECT THE PLACE AND TAKE ALL THE DIRT HOME. WE ALWAYS PICK UP SHIT FROM OTHERS. IT'S A SHAME. THANKS A LOT.

title: (25616) Montgai - LV-3025
description: Rest area next to the road

title: (08700) Igualada - 30 Baixada de la Unió
description: Free parking. Perfect to place the car while visiting the beautiful city centre of the town.

title: (08700) Igualada - 68 Carrer de Carles Riba
description: Nice and quiet place in Igualada. Near the public swimming pool. It’s a recently built public parking. The spots are wide. There is a park next to it.

title: (25747) Gualter - C-1412b
description:
Perfect place, very quiet. Amazing views of both the lake and the town behind. 

To get here you do need to traverse a dirt incline for about 15 meters. 

I managed it very easy in a small front wheel drive.  However for mobile homes it may be too difficult. 
Any small vans or sprinters ect should be fine without 4WD.

title: (25746) Torreblanca - Unnamed Road
description: A small clearing by the river. the river is filled with crayfish, some of which measure up to more than 15 cm.

title: (25411) Fulleda - 17 Avinguda d'Agustina Saragossa i Domènech
title_short: (25411) Fulleda - 17 Avinguda d'Agustina Saragossa i Domènech
description:
Peaceful city where rest, walk or make the itineraries in MTB. There is the nearby cellar Matallonga, where you can visit and taste your wine. Municipal swimming pool and playground for children on the shore.
48 hours maximum.

title: (25230) Mollerussa - 27 Carrer 8 de Marzo
description: Ideal for parking and spending the day. It is next to a large playground and green area. Quiet residential area. At night a little more noise depending on the season.

title: (08787) Orpí - Unnamed Road
description: Small spot on the roadside (very little frequented) and at the start of a hiking trail. a few cyclists and hikers have passed. In the shade! 25 min walk from the La Fou waterfall (dry in August but worth the detour anyway) The "parking" place just before was private.

title: (25791) Tiurana - Unnamed Road
description: On the shores of the lake, space for 4 campers. If you go down the ramp (be careful motorhomes) you get to the shore of the lake. you can stop to eat like us, or spend the night. Very quiet place surrounded by nature.

title: (25730) Artesa de Segre - 106 Carretera de Montsonís
title_short: (25730) Artesa de Segre - 106 Carretera de Montsonís
description: New site with water and waste. On edge of town in car park at school. Rests and shops nearby.

title: (08700) Igualada - 82 Avinguda del Mestre Montaner
description: Bonpreu Esclat car park open 24 hours a day with a shop at night and on holidays, water hose and gas station, restaurants nearby

title: (08779) La Llacuna - 6 Carrer de Cuitora
description: Municipal parking with free access, flat and very central. The town has a municipal swimming pool, supermarket, bars and restaurants and many excursions.

title: (08779) La Llacuna - 2 Cami Castell
description: Parking at the entrance of the city from Sant Joan de Mediona. Spacious and Quiet School days can be noisy during the outings and outings of the scoundrel. Near the center.
